job.title: Software Engineer
job.description:
Aviture is a technology solutions organization made up of individuals who care about our trade and the impact of our services. We strive to make a true difference in our clients lives with the solutions we craft, ensuring the newest techniques are used effectively to promote innovation within our own walls and those of our clients. Our engineers work on next-generation systems across a wide variety of industries including the Department of Defense, communications, healthcare, energy, banking, retail, hospitality, logistics and technical R&D.
The solutions we create have
Saved lives in the California wildfires and southern U.S. flooding
Provided security for the Super Bowl and post-attack Boston Marathon
Provided augmented-reality training environments for surgeons
Enabled major corporations to pivot into IoT
Increased transparency and promoted patient wellness in hospitals and senior care facilities
Provided risk analysis of stock portfolios
Combined computer vision and robotics to automate dangerous manual labor tasks
Preserved life and increased mission success by allowing government leaders to make quick and informed decisions
Part of our ‘secret sauce’ is our continued exposure to diverse and interesting problems and the ability to share ideas across domains in a manner not typically done within a single industry.
At our core, Aviture is a group of engineers seeking to build better solutions. We pursue people with aptitude and drive first and foremost; which allows us a staff that spans across all levels of experience, skillsets, and software disciplines. Our prime candidates are people who have technology in their DNA and want to pursue the ‘why’ behind their work. We value a healthy work-life balance so we provide flex time and reasonable hours, all while pushing ourselves to grow and become faster, better engineers.
If this sounds like the kind of environment you’d like to be in, why don’t you drop us a line? We’d love to talk to you!
Requirements
BS degree in Software Engineering related degree, similar technical field of study or equivalent practical experience
Software development experience within web application development, mobile application development, service/API development, data storage/analytics, cloud platform (AWS/Azure/Google Cloud) development, IoT development and/or machine learning. Larger or more complex applications preferred
Go-getter mentality with good communication skills
Experience working within a team preferred
Interest and ability to learn new technologies/techniques
Benefits
Medical, dental, vision and life insurance
Matching 401k with 100% vesting in six months
Incentive and bonus pay
Generous paid time off
Laptop options
Paid conferences and training
Research and development time
Company vacations
Flex time scheduling
Family events
Free lunch Fridays
Quarterly company event
Aviture hosted Speaker Series
